forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain . Low around 5C. WNW winds shifting to SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain . Low 42F. WNW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and thunderstorms. High near 10C. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High near 50F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High 12C. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 54F. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.
